title: dhEva jivanam
sahitya:
dEva jIvanam aruL dEva dEvanE shivanE



anupallavi



sHavai vellum sahasAttuma shaktiyAl shivan mukti vaLarum



caraNam 1



iruvikAra manattait-tANDi idayAmbara veLiyil niruvikAra

turiya nilaiyil ninrunnaruL onri vAzhum



caraNam 2



vAnum bhuviyum kUDikkuzhaiyum vAzhvinilinbam ilaga

jnAna dEham Eidi praNava nAdajyOti siddhi poliyavE
